statements: SELECT * FROM book_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT reader_name, book_title, rating FROM book_reviews WHERE rating = 5;
SELECT id, book_title, reader_name, rating FROM book_reviews WHERE rating <= 2;
SELECT * FROM book_reviews WHERE book_title LIKE 'Harry%';
SELECT id, book_title, review_text FROM book_reviews WHERE rating = 4;
SELECT * FROM book_reviews WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY book_title ASC;
SELECT book_title, reader_name, rating FROM book_reviews WHERE reader_name LIKE '%Alice%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT book_title, COUNT(id) AS review_count FROM book_reviews GROUP BY book_title HAVING COUNT(id) > 2 ORDER BY review_count DESC;
SELECT reader_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(id) AS total_reviews FROM book_reviews GROUP BY reader_name HAVING total_reviews > 1 ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT id, book_title, rating, review_text FROM book_reviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT book_title, author FROM books WHERE genre='Mystery';
SELECT book_id, book_title, author, genre FROM books ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT book_id, book_title, author, genre FROM books WHERE genre='Thriller' ORDER BY book_title DESC;
SELECT book_title, author, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM books b JOIN reviews r ON b.book_id = r.book_id GROUP BY book_title, author;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE genre = 'Fiction';
SELECT book_title, author FROM books WHERE book_id > 10 ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT book_title, author, rating FROM books JOIN reviews ON books.book_id = reviews.book_id WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT book_title, author, review_text FROM books JOIN reviews ON books.book_id = reviews.book_id WHERE reviews.rating = (SELECT MAX(rating) FROM reviews);
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM books;
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT book_id, title, author FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery';
SELECT reader_id, name, location FROM readers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT book_id, title, author, publication_date FROM books WHERE author = 'George Orwell';
SELECT review_id, rating, review_text FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date;
SELECT r.review_text, b.title, r.rating FROM reviews r JOIN books b ON r.book_id = b.book_id WHERE r.reader_id = 1;
SELECT r.review_id, r.rating, r.review_text, b.title, b.author FROM reviews r JOIN books b ON r.book_id = b.book_id WHERE r.rating < 3;
SELECT r.review_text, b.title, rd.name FROM reviews r JOIN books b ON r.book_id = b.book_id JOIN readers rd ON r.reader_id = rd.reader_id WHERE rd.location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery';
SELECT reader_id, name FROM readers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT review_id, rating, review_text FROM reviews WHERE book_id = 123;
SELECT book_id, title, author, genre FROM books JOIN ratings ON books.book_id = ratings.book_id WHERE stars >= 5;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE genre='Mystery' ORDER BY author ASC
SELECT name, age, city FROM readers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books WHERE author='Agatha Christie' AND genre='Mystery' ORDER BY title ASC
SELECT name, age, city FROM readers WHERE city='New York' OR city='San Francisco' ORDER BY age ASC, name ASC
SELECT title, author, rating FROM books INNER JOIN reviews ON books.book_id = reviews.book_id WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, title ASC
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT title, author, genre FROM books ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT reader_id, name, birthdate FROM readers WHERE subscription_status = true;
SELECT author_name, nationality FROM authors WHERE bio IS NOT NULL;
SELECT genre_name, description FROM genres WHERE description LIKE '%fiction%';
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC
SELECT book_id, title, author FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery' AND publication_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT reader_id, name, email FROM readers WHERE birthdate < '1995-01-01' AND subscription_status = true
SELECT author_id, author_name, nationality FROM authors WHERE bio IS NOT NULL
SELECT genre_name, description FROM genres ORDER BY genre_name ASC LIMIT 5
